snippet: Doug Mills, a photographer for The New York Times, explains how he prepares to cover a Super Bowl.
abstract: Doug Mills, a photographer for The New York Times, explains how he prepares to cover a Super Bowl.
lead_paragraph: A seasoned sports photographer (first with The Associated Press and now with The New York Times), Doug Mills has photographed his fair share of Super Bowls, and the preparation involved is no simple task. David Gonzalez of the Lens blog spoke with him about the process, and you can view a collection of his memorable Super Bowl photographs here.

headline.main: A Photographer on the Super Bowl Sidelines
